name: Käymäläseura Huussi ry/Global Dry Toilet Association of Finland
membership: Finnish Water Forum (FWF), Kepa, Sustainable Sanitation Alliance (SuSana)
goal:
Our vision is to make ecological sanitation and dry toilets an essential part of sustainable development in order to ensure that future generations will also be able to enjoy clean water and a healthy environment.

We want sanitation everywhere to be ecologically, socially, economically and culturally sustainable, and for a natural nutrient cycle to be fulfilled and sustained globally.

The Association is the best known promoter of ecological sanitation in Finland and an expert organisation in DT technology.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Sanitation, dry toilet, nutrient recycling, water and hygiene, sustainable development
